title: WATCH: Perrie Edwards Wears Her Engagement Ring From Zayn Malik in Little Mix’s ‘Love Me Like You’ Video
text:
WATCH: Perrie Edwards Wears Her Engagement Ring From Zayn Malik in Little Mix’s ‘Love Me Like You’ Video 
Published By: Celebuzz - Today 
Perrie Edwards' broken engagement with Zayn Malik is now forever immortalized in Little Mix's new music video for "Love Me Like You."…...
